/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly in the top right corner, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.

On either side of the street, there are trees and shrubs, their green foliage contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The buildings on the right side of the street are made of brick, their red and brown hues adding a touch of warmth to the scene. On the left side of the street, there's a white building, its stark color standing out against the more muted tones of the brick buildings.

The street itself is lined with trees and shrubs, creating a natural border that guides the viewer's eye along the length of the street. The overall effect is a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements, a characteristic feature of many cities in China. The image is a beautiful representation of a typical day in Beijing, capturing the city's unique blend of nature and architecture.
